segments.text: This drawing captures a typical kitchen mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel in hand, plate shining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water cascades down, pooling below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's soaking her shoe and doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What carelessness with the plumbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, hand deep in treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging with her little hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside mocks the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just begging for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
